title: I found a bug >.<
body: I went into a game today and played soraka...everything was fine nothing happened that wasn't normal so i decided to play another game as ahri....everything seemed fine loaded into the game and i cant move restarted my client twice and i still cant move... everything else is working my sums are working the shop is working but i cant move i can ping and everything but i cant move....is this a bugg or something cause im in game atm but i cant move and i got disconnected from it. if i can an AFK 20 min riot u owe me some reasoning behind this

replies.body: Yupe i tried a couple different champs in a custom game i cant move with any of them and even tried to "repair" my league client. didnt work. pls someone fix my client
